channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A review finds a BBC Gaza documentary breached editorial guidelines
Probe must prove Air India fuel switches weren't moved by mistake: Ex-pilot | Morning in America
India orders its airlines to check fuel switches on Boeing jets
4 people were killed in a small plane crash near London Sunday, police say
Leading scientist issues dire warning about disturbing phenomenon in Antarctica: 'I'm not sure I have the capacity to really think it through'
How to declutter your mind in 5 minutes
item.description: Maisha Wynn, lifestyle contributor and author of "The Wynning Way," joins "CBS Mornings Plus" with practical tools for managing stress and finding pea...

item.title: WATCH: Huge military parade in Paris to mark Bastille Day
item.description: French troops, as well as a range of military hardware, paraded down and flew over the Champs-Élysées to mark Bastille Day.

item.title: A military exercise drawing together 19 nations and 35,000 forces begins in Australia
item.description: Australia is hosting its largest-ever military drills, Exercise Talisman Sabre, involving over 35,000 personnel from 19 nations

item.title: Texas flooding live updates: Search continues for missing with 130 dead
item.description: More than 130 people are dead after devastating flooding in the Texas Hill Country that began early on the Fourth of July.

item.title: 9 dead in fire at assisted-living facility: Officials
item.description: Nine people have been killed and dozens are hurt as a fire tore through an assisted-living facility in Fall River, Massachusetts, officials said.

item.title: Boys & Girls Club programs threatened by Trump grant freeze serve thousands of families
1,500 tarantulas found stuffed in spongecake boxes at airport
item.description: The arachnids were found at Cologne Bonn airport after customs officials were tipped off by a "noticeable smell" that did not match the expected aroma...

item.title: 9 dead in Fall River assisted living home fire. "Unfathomable tragedy," chief says.
item.description: Nine people have died in a fire at the Gabriel House assisted living home in Fall River, Massachusetts, the fire chief said.

item.title: Nine killed in fire at Massachusetts assisted living facility
item.description: Flames roared through an assisted-living facility in Massachusetts, killing nine people and trapping residents inside, including some who were hanging...

item.title: WATCH: Paraglider hits phone lines and plunges into river
item.description: Rescue teams retrieved the man and there were no reports of injuries.
